tldr: Affected versions of this package are also vulnerable to XML External Entity (XXE) Injection due to Improper XML Parsing Configuration. The XML parser was configured with entity processing enabled (processEntities: true), which could allow an attacker to craft a malicious SAML message containing external entity references. By exploiting this vulnerability, an attacker may be able to read arbitrary files from the server's file system or induce additional side effects.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `@better-auth/sso` library to the patch version.
